sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我没有很多钱，但是我很快乐。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu hěn duō qián, dànshì wǒ hěn kuàilè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai pas beaucoup d'argent, mais je suis très heureux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't have much money, but I am very happy.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī bēi shuǐ, xièxiè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il vous plaît, donnez-moi un verre d'eau, merci.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a glass of water, thank you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhī māo hěn xiǎo, fēicháng kě'ài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce chat est très petit, il est vraiment adorable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This cat is very small, it's really cute.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà gè rén shì wǒ de lǎoshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette personne est mon professeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That person is my teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiànzài chà wǔ fēnzhōng bā diǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est huit heures moins cinq maintenant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's five minutes to eight now.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎshàng jiù lái, qǐng děng yīxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'arrive tout de suite, veuillez patienter un instant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm coming right away, please wait a moment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎo niǎo zài tiān shàng fēi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les petits oiseaux volent dans le ciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Little birds fly in the sky.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jìn lái zuò yīxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez entrer et vous asseoir un moment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please come in and have a seat.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā měitiān zǎoshang dǎ tàijíquán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pratique le tai-chi chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He practices tai chi every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天天气很好，我们去公园吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tiānqì hěn hǎo, wǒmen qù gōngyuán ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait beau aujourd'hui, allons au parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is nice today, let's go to the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīnnián èrshíwǔ suì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai vingt-cinq ans cette année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am twenty-five years old this year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū hěn yǒuyìsi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre est très intéressant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book is very interesting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ ài wǒ de jiārén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime ma famille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I love my family.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ chī le zǎofàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai déjà pris mon petit-déjeuner.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have already eaten breakfast.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐmen xiǎng hē shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'est-ce que vous voulez boire ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What would you like to drink?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā huì shuō sān zhǒng yǔyán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle sait parler trois langues.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She can speak three languages.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de jiā zài Běijīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma maison est à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My home is in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shū zài zhuōzi shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le livre est sur la table.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The book is on the table.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le sān běn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté trois livres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought three books.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zài qiánmiàn de lùkǒu wǎng zuǒ zhuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tournez à gauche au carrefour devant vous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Turn left at the intersection ahead.
